General.Name: Matichon Public Company Limited
General.Description: Matichon Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, publishes newspapers, pocketbooks, and journals in Thailand. The company provides advertisement services; preparation of various advertising media including engagement of advertising materials; and organizes exhibitions and various activities; training services, and seminars. Matichon Public Company Limited was founded in 1978 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
